🚀 OCTREE API STRESS TESTS
==================================================

🔥 API STRESS TEST: Invalid Input Handling
============================================================
🔍 Testing invalid octree creation...
   Case 1: Properly rejected bounds (10, 10, 10, 0, 0, 0)
   Case 2: Properly rejected bounds (0, 10, 0, 10, 0, 10)

   Case 5: Created with bounds (-inf, 0, 0, 10, 10, 10) (unexpected success)

🔍 Testing invalid insertions...

   Inserted (0, 100, 0, 'out_of_bounds_y') - unexpected success
   Inserted (0, 0, 100, 'out_of_bounds_z') - unexpected success

   Inserted (-10, -10, -10, 'exactly_on_min_boundary') - unexpected success

🔍 Testing invalid queries...

   Properly rejected query (nan, 0, 0, 5, 5, 5): ValueError
   Properly rejected query (0, 0, 0, nan, 5, 5): ValueError
   Query (-inf, 0, 0, 5, 5, 5) returned 0 results (unexpected success)
   Query (0, 0, 0, inf, 5, 5) returned 0 results (unexpected success)

📊 Invalid input handling: 6/22 properly rejected
